page.title: 09FAMILY LIFE 2
page.content: About a third of couples go to parties or meals at friends' houses once or twice a year. Many families have pets, the most popular are dogs and fish. Of families who take a newspaper, most read the "Mirror", "Sun" or "Star". most families take their holidays in Britain. Yarmouth and Skegness are the most popular. Spain is the most popular foreign holiday. Many adults belong to working men's clubs and sports clubs. A few go to keep fit classes. Many children belong to Scouts, Guides or Youth Clubs. Most families stick to English food; fried food with chips usually eaten in front of the television. Only a few regularly eat rice or pasta.
